projects.title: EdBacker
projects.description: Fundraising web-application for schools. Technologies used: JS (JQuery), PHP (Yii), MySQL. In this project, I played a key role in front-end and back-end development. I used JS and JQuery for front-end interactivity and PHP Yii for back-end development. Integration with PayPal API for payment processing was also part of my responsibilities.

projects.title: Diploma
projects.description: Web application for interaction with patients of a medical facility. Technologies used: Java, React, MySQL, Spring framework. As a web developer, I was responsible for implementing the front-end using React, designing user interfaces, and integrating them with the back-end services built with Java and Spring framework. I also worked on database integration using MySQL.

projects.title: CV
projects.description: Personal CV website built with NextJS and Tailwind. As a web developer, I created my own CV website using NextJS, a React framework, and Tailwind for styling. I designed and developed the entire website, including the layout, responsive design, and content management.
